name: Trevor Allred
summary: I am a software executive with a passion for programming. I design, build, deploy, and manage SaaS applications for consumers and enterprise users alike. Ever since I built my first social network, Rockclimbing.com, in 1999, I have excelled at bringing value to end users via the web. With almost 30 years of programming experience--20 years professionally--I have a passion for building solutions. As a natural leader and with help from my two business degrees I am able to understand the business world very well. My natural intelligence coupled with a strong personality enable me to understand an immense range of technologies, engineers, processes, and scenarios. I always want to be on the winning team and work tirelessly to recruit the best people, create the most efficient environment, and deliver the best product possible.

where.name: PICS Auditing, LLC
where.title: Vice President of Software Engineering
where.summary: As VP of Engineering, I am in charge of our flagship product PICS Organizer--a web based application that enables large companies manage their subcontractors.
where.about: As the fastest-growing company in the world in supplier and contractor management, PICS is a renowned contractor prequalification company. PICS helps the largest organizations in the world create a safe and sustainable supply chain and is the global standard in contractor screening. PICS is headquartered in Irvine, California, with offices in Texas, Canada, United Kingdom, Germany, Brazil, Australia and Singapore. Norwest Venture Partners made a $35 million minority equity investment in PICS in December 2012.
where.role: My primary focus at PICS has been PICS Organizer, our flagship web based application that powers all our operations. In 2007, I joined PICS as employee #7 and have been a major reason for the company's growth and success.

whats.name: GUARD Builder
whats.summary: Created a set of tools for use by business analysts to build a robust and scalable question/answer workflow for clients in a wide variety of industries.
whats.about: PICS needed to gather tens of thousands of questions from clients each day. Using a multi-tenant architecture, we needed a robust, yet flexible architecture. GUARD Builder technology enables business analysts to create a wide range of questionnaires based on the client's location, industries, and risk profiles.
